ComicInfo.Title: The Frogman; Terror in the Sky; Tour of Horror; The Firewalker's Revenge!; Rivals Unto Death!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:09:19. [Issue ID 11257]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ken Bald,Lin Streeter,Sheldon Moldoff,Al Camy,Ken Landau,Bob Forgione,Lin Streeter,Sheldon Moldoff,Al Camy,Ken Landau,Bob Forgione
ComicInfo.Inker: Ken Bald,Lin Streeter,Sheldon Moldoff,George Klein,Ken Landau,Bob Forgione,Lin Streeter,Sheldon Moldoff,George Klein,Ken Landau,Bob Forgione
ComicInfo.Summary:
A humanoid frog monster called the "Frogman" attacks anyone who visits a haunted swamp causing it's victims to turn into tadpole people.
Mildred Joyce meets the dashing Leland Gaylord in New York City and they decide to take a bus tour of Manhattan. During the tour, the bus shows women being murdered and their corpses entering the bus. It turns out these women were murdered by Leland (who marries young women and then murders them for their money) and are not only trying to warn Mildred of her fate but to get revenge on their killer.
